Dungaree shorts in washed stretch twill with adjustable straps, a chest pocket, side pockets and back pockets. Buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and small pocket at the back.

Shirt in cotton twill with a concealed button-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Top in a plumeti cotton weave with a round neck, embroidery at the top and an opening and button at the back of the neck. Yoke with a flounced trim that continues over the shoulders.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, stretch twill with a brushed finish. Zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight hems.

Scarf in a soft jacquard knit. Size 15x110 cm.

Hairband in woven fabric with a sheen. Knot detail at the front and elastication at the back.

Jumpsuit in woven fabric with a round neck, short cap sleeves and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener at the back and straight, wide legs.

Satin sandals with straps over the foot and concealed elastication at the heel. Imitation leather linings and rubber soles. Covered heels approx. 10 cm.
High-waisted shorts in soft, washed Tencel™ lyocell with a rope-look tie belt, concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Pleats at the top, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Imitation leather mules with open toes and a knot detail at the front. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 9 cm.

Trainers in mesh and imitation suede with plastic and imitation leather details, a rubber text print and elasticated, drawstring lacing. Recycled mesh linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) and rubber soles.
Satin nightslip with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck with a wide lace trim.

Lightweight running jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a zip down the front and zipped side pockets. Hood that can be rolled up and fastened into the back of the neck with a tab and press-stud, a loose yoke at the back and mesh back section. Drawstring hem and reflective details. Unlined.
Flared vest top in a crêpe weave with beaded embroidery and narrow tie shoulder straps.
Shirt jacket in imitation suede with a collar and zip down the front. Open chest pocket, discreet side pockets and long sleeves with a press-stud at the cuffs.
Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a contrasting colour integral sports bra. Bra with a double-layered front, elasticated hem and racer back.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist, frill-trimmed side pockets and a frill at the hems.
Imitation suede sandals with rounded toes and block heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 8 cm.
Imitation suede slingbacks with pointed toes and a decorative bow at the back. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 5.2 cm.
Wide, straight-cut jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels and concealed buttons at the front. Long sleeves, front pockets and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Dress in an airy, patterned weave with elastication at the top, narrow, braided shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and asymmetric hem. Satin lining.
Sleeveless, A-line dress in airy, patterned chiffon with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim around the neckline and armholes. The dress lining is made from recycled polyester.

Jumpsuit in an airy viscose weave with short, flounced sleeves and smocking at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow and tassels, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Playsuit in a patterned viscose weave with short cap sleeves and elastication and a button placket at the top. Elasticated seam and decorative bow at the waist and side pockets.

Wide blouse in an airy cotton weave containing glittery threads with a slit at the neck and double-layered gathered yoke with tassels at the front. Buttons at the top of the back and short, wide sleeves with gathers at the shoulders. Longer and rounded at the back.
